subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that constant names conform to a specified pattern. A constant is a static and final field or an interface/annotation field, except serialVersionUID and serialPersistentFields.

tr.td: Control if check should apply to package-private members.
Control if check should apply to private members.
Control if check should apply to protected members.
Control if check should apply to public members.
Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: The following configuration apart from names allowed by default allows log or logger:
The following configuration skip validation on public constant field and protected constant field.

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="ConstantName"> <property name="applyToPublic" value="false"/> <property name="applyToProtected" value="false"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
